member.name: IAppxEncryptedBundleWriter.AddPayloadPackageEncrypted
member.summary: Encrypts a new payload package to the bundle.
member.param: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.
An that provides the contents of fileName. The stream must support , , and .
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptedBundleWriter.Close
member.summary: Writes the bundle manifest and blockmap footprint files to the bundle.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptedBundleWriter
member.summary: Provides a write-only object model for encrypted bundle packages.
